# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is valued at $80 to me. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its worth and benefits, I am offering it to you for $95. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive value this item holds. I look forward to your consideration. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $95. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $95
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $120
